title: Ford dealership social content + lead tracking app (manual media + follow-up pipeline)

requirements.text: Implement Internet Identity sign-in and restrict the app so only authenticated users can access dealership content and lead management screens.

quotes: I need an app that will generate automated social media content for a ford dealership ... optimized to generate, track, and follow up with leads

acceptanceCriteria: Unauthenticated users are prompted to sign in with Internet Identity before seeing the dashboard.
After sign-in, the UI shows the signed-in principal and a sign-out control.
All primary pages (content generator, asset library, leads) are inaccessible without authentication.

requirements.text: Create a dealership social media content generator that produces editable, exportable post packages for a Ford dealership using deterministic templates (no external AI calls): platform, campaign objective, model (e.g., F-150/Mustang/Explorer), offer details, tone, CTA, and output fields for caption, hashtags, shot list, and posting checklist.

quotes: generate automated social media content for a ford dealership

acceptanceCriteria: User can generate a new content package from a form with at least: platform, model, offer, tone, CTA, and campaign objective.
Generated content includes at minimum: caption text, hashtag set, and a short creative/shot list.
User can edit generated fields before saving.
Saved content packages persist in the backend and reload on refresh.
User can export/copy the caption + hashtags to clipboard from the UI.

requirements.text: Add a 'Video Asset' workflow that supports Sora 2 outputs without integrating Sora 2 directly: allow users to attach externally generated videos to a content package by uploading a video file or by storing an external URL plus metadata (prompt used, duration, aspect ratio, status).
acceptanceCriteria: A content package supports zero or more video assets.
User can add a video asset by either (a) uploading a file via the frontend UI or (b) entering an external URL.
Each video asset stores metadata fields including: title, prompt text, duration, aspect ratio, and status (Draft/Ready/Published).
Video assets are viewable/playable from the content package detail screen.
No backend code performs calls to Sora 2 or any external AI provider.

requirements.text: Provide lead capture landing pages tied to content packages: generate a shareable landing page link per content package that includes tracking parameters and a lead form (name, phone/email, vehicle interest, timeframe, consent checkbox). Store submissions as leads associated to the originating content package.

quotes: optimized to generate, track, and follow up with leads for people who want to buy cars

acceptanceCriteria: Each content package has a unique landing page route that can be shared.
Landing page includes a lead capture form with required validation and a consent checkbox.
Submitting the form creates a Lead record linked to the originating content package and captures timestamp + ref/UTM parameters from the URL.
After submission, the user sees a confirmation screen and the lead appears in the authenticated dashboard leads list.
Landing pages are publicly accessible (no login) while lead management remains authenticated.

requirements.text: Implement a lead tracking pipeline (CRM-lite) with statuses and follow-up tasks: New, Contacted, Qualified, Test Drive Scheduled, Won, Lost. Support notes, next follow-up date, and task completion logging per lead.

quotes: track, and follow up with leads

acceptanceCriteria: Leads can be listed, filtered by status, and searched by name/contact.
A lead detail view shows contact info, vehicle interest, source content package, notes history, and follow-up tasks.
Users can update lead status and set a next follow-up date.
Users can add timestamped notes and mark follow-up tasks as completed.
All lead updates persist in the backend and survive refresh.

requirements.text: Add content-to-lead attribution views: for each content package, display counts of generated leads by status and a simple timeline of lead submissions.
acceptanceCriteria: Content package detail shows total leads generated and breakdown by lead status.
A list/timeline shows lead submissions (time + name + status) for that content package.
Dashboard includes a simple 'Top content by leads' section showing content packages sorted by lead count.

requirements.text: Create a coherent, distinct visual theme appropriate for an automotive dealership marketing tool (not blue/purple): define a consistent color palette, typography scale, spacing, and component styling across all screens.
acceptanceCriteria: All primary screens (dashboard, content generator, content detail, leads list, lead detail, landing page) share a consistent theme.
Theme uses a non-blue/non-purple primary accent and maintains accessible contrast for text and buttons.
UI uses a consistent layout system (navigation + main content area) and standardized form styling.

requirements.text: Add static generated brand visuals to the frontend and use them in the UI (logo/wordmark and a hero illustration) by placing assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and referencing them directly from the frontend.
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images exist in frontend/public/assets/generated with the exact filenames specified in image requirements.
The app uses the logo in the main navigation/header and uses the hero image on the dashboard or landing page.
Images are served as static assets (no backend image proxying).

constraints: Do not integrate or call Sora 2 (or any external AI/LLM/video generation provider) directly from the frontend or backend; support only manual upload/URL attachment workflows for externally generated videos.
Do not integrate social media platform APIs (e.g., Instagram/Facebook/Twitter) for auto-posting; content must be generated for manual posting/export.
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor (no multi-service architecture).
Authentication must use Internet Identity only.
nonGoals: Automatic publishing/scheduling to social media platforms.
Automated AI generation of captions/videos via third-party AI services.
Email/SMS/push notification sending for follow-ups (store tasks and dates only).
Integration with external CRMs (Salesforce/HubSpot) or external databases.

required: Automotive dealership app logo wordmark, clean modern typography, black + warm accent (ford-lead-studio-logo.dim_512x512.png)
Hero illustration of a modern car showroom with abstract marketing/analytics elements, warm neutral palette (dealership-hero.dim_1600x900.png)
